title: Emerald Vaagai Jhumkas - Timeless Elegance
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) in a Pave Setting. Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant finish.
features: Intricately designed Jhumkas featuring a floral motif framework studded with dazzling CZs. Emeralds are bezel set, creating a focal point. Delicate strands of seed pearls dangle gracefully from the base. The openwork design provides a light and airy feel, blending traditional aesthetics with modern comfort.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for festive occasions like Diwali and Eid. Adds a touch of regal charm to any special event.
description: These Jhumkas combine the timeless appeal of traditional South Indian design with the affordability of CZs and natural pearls. The genuine emeralds add a touch of luxury. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring a captivating shine. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear, making them a cherished addition to any jewelry collection. These pieces are designed to be passed down through generations as valuable heirlooms.
